requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with OpenGL 4.1
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
